value.name: HBO to Premier 'Hacking Democracy' Just Prior to November Election!
value.description: HBO has just announced that they will be debuting Hacking Democracy, the long-awaited documentary film by Simon Ardizzone, Robert Carrillo Cohen and Russell Michaels, on November 2nd --- just days before millions of Americans will head to the polls to use ...

value.name: Cop blotter: radiator hose theft averted
